backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a social network for rock/metal fans with user profiles, friend requests, feed posts, blocking, reporting, rate limiting, and role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: gateway fallback mechanism, network status indicator, and DNS cache clearing assistance for ICP gateway connectivity issues.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the MetalHead social network application.
frontend/delete-account/index.html: HTML entry point for the standalone delete account page required for Google Play submission, with PWA metadata and icons.
frontend/docs/google-play-aab.md: Documentation guide explaining how to build an Android App Bundle (AAB) using Trusted Web Activity (TWA) approach with Bubblewrap for Google Play publishing.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system with red/orange primary palette for rock/metal aesthetic in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point for the MetalHead web app with PWA manifest, icons, and meta tags for the age-verified rock/punk/metal social network.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Android Digital Asset Links configuration file template for verifying app ownership required for Trusted Web Activity (TWA) integration.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and theme colors for MetalHead social network installable web app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, age verification, delete account page routing, in-app browser detection, and cache clearing modal integration.
frontend/src/components/blocks/BlockedUs: Component displaying a blocked user's profile information with an unblock button, showing display name and truncated principal ID.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a single post card with like, delete, friend request, block/unblock, and report functionality. Handles user interactions and shows post metadata including author, timestamp, and like count.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCompose: Provides a text area form for creating new posts with a 500-character limit and character counter. Validates input and displays success/error toasts on submission.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRe: Displays a list of pending friend requests with accept/decline buttons. Shows user avatars, display names, and handles request responses with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsL: Renders a grid of friend cards showing avatars, display names, bios, and favorite genres. Displays loading skeletons and empty state when no friends exist.
Main application shell with responsive navigation for desktop and mobile. Manages page routing between Feed, Friends, Profile, Blocked, and Settings pages with logout functionality and network status indicator.
frontend/src/components/profile/ClearFav: Confirmation dialog for removing all favorite bands from a user's profile. Displays band count and warns that the action cannot be undone.
frontend/src/components/report/ReportDia: Modal dialog for reporting posts or users with predefined reasons (Spam, Harassment, etc.) and optional details field limited to 150 characters. Submits reports and displays confirmation toasts.
frontend/src/components/settings/Publish: Displays a step-by-step checklist UI for publishing the MetalHead app to Google Play, including creating a developer account, generating an AAB file, uploading to Play Console, and completing required forms. Integrates the StoreAssetsPanel component for store listing assets.
frontend/src/components/settings/StoreAs: Renders a grid of downloadable store listing assets (app icon, feature graphic, screenshots) with preview images and external links. Includes an alert about PWA icons referenced in the web app manifest.
frontend/src/components/system/CacheClea: Modal that appears after 3 consecutive gateway connection failures, providing device-specific cache clearing instructions and alternative solutions like switching networks or trying a different gateway URL.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches unhandled errors and displays a user-friendly error card with the error message and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/system/InAppBrow: Full-screen overlay warning users about browser compatibility issues in in-app browsers, providing instructions to open the app in a regular browser with quick action buttons to copy the URL or open externally.
frontend/src/components/system/NetworkSt: Displays a status icon in the UI showing gateway connection state (failed, fallback, or normal), with tooltips explaining the status and a retry button when connection has failed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on the current Internet Identity, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGatewayStatus.ts: Zustand store for tracking gateway connection state (normal/fallback/failed) with consecutive failure counting, retry logic, and a manual retry hook that reloads the page.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence via AuthClient, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend API calls including user profiles, posts, friend requests, and reports, with gateway status tracking and error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, including sidebar, chart, and UI component tokens.
frontend/src/lib/genres.ts: Utility functions and constants for music genre handling, converting Genre variant types to display labels and providing predefined genre options.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Utility function to format timestamps as relative time strings (e.g., '5m ago', '2h ago', '3d ago').
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AgeVerificationPage.t: Age verification form requiring users to confirm they are 21+ and enter a display name with validation before creating their profile.
frontend/src/pages/BlockedUsersPage.tsx: Page displaying a list of blocked users with BlockedUserRow components, showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DeleteAccountPage.tsx: Account deletion page with authentication check, warning alerts about permanent data removal, and confirmation dialog before executing account deletion.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed page with a post composer and a list of posts fetched via useGetFeed hook. Shows loading spinner or empty state when appropriate.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed interface showing the user's friends list and pending friend requests. Uses useGetFriends and useGetPendingRequests hooks with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero background, branding, and Internet Identity login button. Displays app features and 21+ age requirement for a metal/rock social platform.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editing page allowing users to update display name, bio, location, favorite genres, and bands. Includes validation, confirmation dialog for clearing bands, and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page with sign-out functionality, account deletion navigation, app link sharing, build info display, and Google Play publishing section. Includes clipboard copy utilities.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend error messages into user-friendly strings by detecting error patterns for rate limiting, blocking, and validation errors across various fields.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides build information utilities to retrieve and format build timestamp and version from environment variables or defaults.
frontend/src/utils/deviceDetection.ts: Detects device type (Android/iOS/desktop) and browser type, then provides platform-specific cache clearing instructions for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/utils/externalBrowserAction: Provides functions to copy the current app URL to clipboard and attempt to open it in an external browser, with toast notifications for user feedback.
frontend/src/utils/gatewayFallback.ts: Implements ICP gateway error detection, automatic retry logic with exponential backoff, and alternative gateway URL building (raw.icp0.io) for handling canister resolution failures.
frontend/src/utils/iiReturnFlow.ts: Detects if the current URL is an Internet Identity callback/return URL by checking for common II authentication patterns in the URL and hash.
frontend/src/utils/inAppBrowser.ts: Detects Facebook, Messenger, and Instagram in-app browsers via user agent strings and provides platform-specific instructions for opening links in external browsers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and URL cleanup functions.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates display names (5-50 characters, alphanumeric plus hyphens only) and provides user-friendly error messages and rule descriptions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme settings, container queries, typography plugin, and custom animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, path aliases, environment variable injection for canister IDs, multi-page build setup (main and delete-account), and dev server proxy to local replica.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking known ICP gateway issues and implemented features including gateway fallback mechanisms, network status indicators, and DNS cache clearing suggestions.
